projects.name: Animaciones CSS
projects.description: Work of initiation to animations through css. It consists of an element that travels to the point you want, and returns. In this case they are coins

projects.name: Desactivar Escudos
projects.description: Mini-game to deactivate shields, with the game of the hangman, visually like a classic space invaders.

projects.name: Weekend Website
projects.description: Web design for a music festival. Practice for aesthetics, and web interface design.

projects.name: Animaciones JS
projects.description: Work of initiation to animations through javascript.

projects.name: Investigación CSS
projects.description: CSS research paper, on the use of nth-child. How is it used, what does it affect...

projects.name: Alumnos con Vector
projects.description: CRUD design, student table design, data modification, cell deletion, etc.

projects.name: Viaje del heroe V2
projects.description: Introduction to matrices, dynamic grid and character generation, and movement through keyboard events.

projects.name: Ajedrez V2
projects.description: Second attempt at animated chess. Displays the board that the user enters, if it is 8x8 the figures appear.

projects.name: Congreso
projects.description: Web design for the Artificial Intelligence conference. Practice for design, layout and aesthetics.

projects.name: Tragaperras
projects.description: Mini slot game, where you have credits, and you can win or lose everything.

projects.name: Ajedrez V1
projects.description: First attempt to generate a chessboard dynamically, independently of the squares entered by the user.

projects.name: Adivina la secuencia
projects.description: Mini-game of guessing the correct color sequence, like Simon Says, if you win, the difficulty increases.

projects.name: Evento
projects.description: Simple programming event website to improve css, aesthetics and interface design.

projects.name: Viaje del heroe V1
projects.description: Work on dynamic character creation and movement by clicking on buttons on the screen. Attempt number 1

projects.name: Lanzamiento de dados
projects.description: Work of dice rolls, for calculation of rolls, averages, summations, dynamically in an interface.

projects.name: Elige tu aventura
projects.description: Graphic adventure work, following the scripts of choose your own adventure, by elections.

projects.name: Caja fuerte
projects.description: Mini-game job open the safe, the user has 3 attempts to open the safe by entering a 3-digit pin number.

projects.name: Calculadora Habilidad
projects.description: Initiation work on variables and dynamical elements generated on the basis of data entered by the user.

projects.name: Zodiaco
projects.description: Zodiac sign work, personalized answers according to your day of birth

projects.name: Mapa sensible
projects.description: Sensitive image map work, by means of imagemap and figures with concrete coordinates on which to perform mouse events.

projects.name: Areas
projects.description: Introductory work to Javascript, area calculator of different figures. Automated by entering values.

projects.name: Enlaces
projects.description: Introductory work in HTML. Learning links and anchor in functional web, with access to the pages to each other. And several anchor links in the subpages themselves.
